name: $alerts
desc: A list of part adverse reactions.

name: $adverserxns
desc: A list of Allergies for the patient.

name: $allergies
desc: A list of medication statements for the patient.

name: $medications
desc: A list of problems that the patient is known of have (or have had in the past).

name: $problems
desc: A list of items that constitute a set of work to be performed (typically this code would be specialized for more specific uses, such as a ward round list).

name: $worklist
desc: A list of items waiting for an event (perhaps a surgical patient waiting list).

name: $waiting
desc: A set of protocols to be followed.

name: $protocols
desc: A set of care plans that apply in a particular context of care.
